content.text: Define _density
the volume of the sheet,
the average thickness of the sheet
thickness =   .........
The density of aluminium is \(2.70 \text{g} /\text{cm}^3\). The thickness of a rectangular sheet of aluminium foil varies, but is much less than \(1 \text{mm}\)
A student wishes to find the average thickness. She obtains the following measurements
mass of sheet = 60.7 g
length of sheet = 50.0 cm
width of sheet = 30.0 cm
Calculate the student's values for
Name a measuring instrument she could use
Describe the procedure she should follow to obtain an accurate value average thickness of the sheet
Details of how to read the instrument are not required
Another student, provided with a means of cutting the sheet, decides to find its average thickness using a single measuring instrument. Assume the surfaces of the sheet are perfectly smooth

the time at which the ball reaches its maximum height,
the deceleration of the ball,

the maximum height reached by the ball

The graph in Fig. 2.1 shows how the velocity changes with time until the ball reaches its maximum height
Use the graph to find,

position 1,
position 2,
position 3
